TopicTitle: Foil the April Fool's prank above you!

Articles.Content:
Oh, look! It's April Fool's day! (Or, at least it will be in 20 minutes for me...)

 

Exactly as the title says. This is rather similar to the wish corrupting thread, except you are telling the previous poster how their April Fools prank will go wrong, and then to provide a new prank for the next poster to foil.

Example:

Poster 1: I put a box of packing peanuts over a doorway and tie a string to the box and to the doorknob, so that when someone walks into the room he or she will have a box of packing peanuts fall onto their head.

Poster 2: The people you intend to prank spot the box through a window and hesitate to enter the room. Someone else in the room pulls the string in an attempt to spill the packing peanuts on them, but ends up dumping them on you. My prank is to put all of the cereal bags in different boxes \so that when one person wants to have Lucky Charms, they get *shudder* raisin bran instead.

And so on.

 

My prank will be to install a small remote controlled switch flicking robot in my house's breaker box so that I can simulate a power outage.

Happy April Fools' for ya.

I don't celebrate April Fools, so skip me.

Edited April 1, 2017 by Hypercosmic

But your April fools prank is to not do a prank, so you just foiled your own prank! (That makes no sense...) 

My April fools prank is to print out two or three dozen troll faces and tape them all over the place on Monday.

Your printer runs out of ink in a freak strike of indoor pranking!

I set your clock forward by a day so you forget that it's April 1st and take all the pranks seriously.

You forget to change all the clocks, so you get punished by ABSOLUTELY EVERYONE!

I switch out boiled eggs for raw eggs and watch everyone try to peel boiled eggs and get eggs all over them >:D

Joke's on you, I don't handle raw or boiled eggs, I just eat scrambled eggs.

My prank is: I replace the driveshaft in someone's car with a cardboard tube that looks identical.

I bike to work today!

My prank: I pi someone in the face.

They out-pi you. Wow! Two hundred digits and counting!

I present tantalizing glimpses of cake throughout the day, but all the bakeries are closed. You now really want cake, but cannot have it.

But wait! There's a bunch of ice cream to eat instead. The desire for cake no longer controls thee.

I give a glass of "water" to someone who hates carbonation (the water is actually sprite or one of those other clear sodas)

But you accidentally give them normal water. 

I swapped the plugs for the vacuum cleaner and the computer and then someone accidentally unplugged the computer instead of the vacuum cleaner. And because I did this two days ago on April fools and it already happened you can't foil me (unless you have a time machine)!

I color-code my cords.

I change the lock on your bike to an identical one with a different combination.

Jokes on you! The lock is from a crappy brand, and all the keys are the same.

I replace all the soda in a six pack of coke/Pepsi with soy sauce!

I prefer Sprite.

I put butter on the bottom of your shoes.

Good thing I'm a Michael Jackson impersonator!

 

I fill your shoes with peanut butter.

1 hour ago, Xorth Tanovar said:

I fill your shoes with peanut butter.

Jokes on you, those were my lawn mowing shoes. Haven't mowed my lawn for a long time. Also, Mmm! Peanut butter!

I fill your entire closet with peanut butter.

Wow, this is pretty good quality, I'll sell it for big cash!

Congrats! You can* go to space as a passenger on STS Challenger!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

*mandatory

Edited April 8, 2017 by Spacetraindriver
